review: got this for my dad for his birthday. was super easy to use. dont bother buying one of those short USB cables "made" for this, because it comes with one. Yea its a bit long but its got a velcro. up and running in like 15 minutes, needs some updates. He has a smart tv with a netflix app but running netflix through the chromecast rather than the smarthub was much easier (faster, better pic quality somehow, easier to search for show titles and navigate in general). Can't cast amazon prime instant videos or videos from Facebook (my mom would like this as she is always showing you videos my brother has posted of my niece), but youtube, pandora and netflix work well with the cast. GREAT value for the price. A+ google as always
